Yot. Yot.

Here you may find some random musings about open source projects which I may or may not be working on (and which are hosted on GitHub).

I’m a software developer with a background in C on embedded devices, who has moved towards Ruby and (more recently) JavaScript. Working as a freelancer, a CTO, opportunities arise from time to time to share some work for free with the world at large.
